data.content:
Syndra (Default)

RP Cost: N/A

Release Date: N/A

Syndra, the Dark Sovereign, is a powerful mage in the popular online game League of Legends. As one of the game's original champions, Syndra has become a fan-favorite due to her unique abilities and intriguing backstory. In this article, we will delve into the details of Syndra's default costume, explore her story, strengths, weaknesses, and her significance in the game.

The Default Costume

Syndra's default costume is the original appearance of the champion when players first encounter her in the game. It showcases her as a dark and mysterious mage, reflecting her role as the Dark Sovereign. She wears a flowing black robe adorned with golden accents, symbolizing her immense power and control over dark magic. Her long, flowing hair is a vibrant shade of purple, adding to her enigmatic aura. Syndra's eyes glow with a bright purple hue, signifying her connection to the arcane forces she wields.

The default costume perfectly captures Syndra's essence as a powerful and intimidating mage. It highlights her dark and mysterious nature, making her a visually striking champion on the battlefield. Whether players choose to embrace her as an ally or face her as an opponent, Syndra's default costume leaves a lasting impression.

The Story of Syndra

Syndra's story is one of tragedy, power, and a thirst for revenge. Born in the Ionian province of Ionia, Syndra possessed an innate connection to magic from a young age. However, her powers were seen as dangerous and uncontrollable by the Ionian elders, who sought to suppress her abilities. Frustrated by their attempts to stifle her potential, Syndra rebelled against their authority and unleashed her powers with devastating consequences.

In her quest for power, Syndra discovered the ancient and forbidden art of dark magic. She embraced this forbidden knowledge, harnessing its immense power to become the Dark Sovereign. With her newfound abilities, Syndra sought to exact revenge on those who had tried to suppress her. She became a force to be reckoned with, wielding her dark magic to manipulate and destroy her enemies.

Syndra's story is one of isolation and defiance. She is a character driven by her desire for power and her refusal to be controlled. Her journey in the game reflects her determination to prove her worth and establish herself as a dominant force in the world of League of Legends.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Syndra's strengths lie in her ability to manipulate and control spheres of dark magic. She excels at long-range attacks, using her abilities to deal significant damage to her opponents from a safe distance. Her ultimate ability, Unleashed Power, allows her to unleash a barrage of dark spheres, obliterating her enemies in a devastating display of power.

However, Syndra's power comes at a cost. She is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making her vulnerable to assassins and champions with high mobility. Additionally, her abilities require precise positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness. Players must have a good understanding of Syndra's kit and be able to predict their opponents' movements to fully utilize her potential.

Syndra in the Game

Syndra is a popular pick in the mid-lane role, where her long-range abilities and burst damage make her a formidable opponent. Her ability to control the battlefield with her dark spheres and stun enemies with her Scatter the Weak ability gives her team a significant advantage in team fights.

In professional play, Syndra has been a staple pick for mid-lane players due to her ability to dominate the laning phase and snowball the game in her team's favor. Her high skill ceiling and potential for outplays make her an exciting champion to watch in competitive matches.

Whether you're a fan of Syndra or looking to learn more about her, this page provides a comprehensive collection of information and videos showcasing all of Syndra's appearances in the game. From her default costume to her various skins, you can explore the visual evolution of this powerful mage and witness her in action on the battlefield.

Syndra (Bewitching Syndra)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: October 29, 2019

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles. One such champion is Syndra, a powerful mage who wields the power of dark spheres. Syndra has received numerous skins over the years, each offering a fresh take on her appearance and abilities. One of the most captivating skins in her collection is

Released on October 29, 2019, Bewitching Syndra is a skin that perfectly captures the essence of the Halloween season. With its dark and enchanting theme, this skin transforms Syndra into a bewitching sorceress, ready to cast her spells and dominate the battlefield. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin offers a variety of new visual and sound effects, making it a must-have for Syndra enthusiasts.

Details of the Costume

Bewitching Syndra features a complete overhaul of Syndra's appearance, giving her a more sinister and mystical look. Her traditional dark robes are replaced with a more elegant and enchanting attire, adorned with intricate patterns and golden accents. Her hair is styled in a flowing manner, with a touch of purple highlights, adding to her otherworldly charm.

One of the most striking changes in this skin is Syndra's dark spheres. Instead of the usual blue hue, they are now a vibrant purple, emanating an eerie glow. The spheres are also adorned with golden accents, giving them a more magical and enchanting appearance. When Syndra casts her abilities, the spheres leave behind a trail of purple particles, further enhancing the bewitching theme.

Additionally, Bewitching Syndra introduces new animations and sound effects. Her recall animation showcases her summoning a cauldron and performing a magical ritual, adding a touch of flair to her base recall animation. Her abilities also have unique sound effects, with a more mystical and haunting tone, perfectly complementing the skin's theme.

Syndra's Story

Syndra, the Dark Sovereign, is a champion with a rich lore and a complex past. Born with immense magical potential, Syndra was feared and shunned by her village due to her uncontrollable powers. She was eventually discovered by the infamous mage, Master Xerath, who promised to teach her how to harness her abilities.

Under Xerath's guidance, Syndra learned to control her powers and became a formidable mage. However, her thirst for power and desire to surpass her mentor led her down a dark path. Syndra rebelled against Xerath, seeking to claim his power for herself. In a climactic battle, Syndra unleashed her full potential, causing destruction and chaos.

After the battle, Syndra was imprisoned by the Ionian authorities, fearing her immense power. Years later, she managed to escape her confinement and sought revenge against those who had imprisoned her. Syndra now roams the world, seeking to unleash her full potential and prove herself as the true master of her abilities.

Syndra's Strengths and Weaknesses

Syndra is a mage with immense burst damage potential, making her a formidable threat in team fights. Her ability to manipulate dark spheres allows her to deal massive damage to multiple enemies at once. Her ultimate ability, Unleashed Power, can instantly eliminate squishy targets and turn the tide of a battle.

However, Syndra's strength lies in her ability to position herself properly and land her skillshots. Her abilities require precise aim and timing, making her a high skill-cap champion. Additionally, Syndra lacks mobility and is vulnerable to assassins and champions who can close the gap quickly.

Despite her weaknesses, Syndra's burst damage and zoning potential make her a popular pick in competitive play. Her ability to control the battlefield and pick off priority targets makes her a valuable asset to any team composition.

Explore Syndra's Appearances

If you're interested in exploring Syndra's various appearances and skins, you've come to the right place. On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Syndra's skins, including the captivating Bewitching Syndra skin. Whether you're a fan of her classic look or prefer a more whimsical theme, Syndra's skins offer a variety of options to suit your taste.

So, dive into the world of Syndra and discover the many facets of this powerful mage. Whether you choose to embrace her dark and enchanting side with Bewitching Syndra or opt for a different look, Syndra's skins are sure to leave a lasting impression on the battlefield.

Syndra (Withered Rose Syndra)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: October 29, 2021

Withered Rose Syndra is a stunning skin that brings a touch of elegance and darkness to the powerful mage, Syndra. Released on October 29, 2021, this skin offers a unique and captivating visual experience for players who are fans of Syndra or simply appreciate the beauty of the design.

The Withered Rose Syndra skin transforms Syndra into a mesmerizing sorceress with a dark and mysterious aura. Her abilities are enhanced with beautiful rose-themed effects, showcasing her control over the arcane powers. The skin features a color palette dominated by deep purples, blacks, and vibrant roses, creating a striking contrast that perfectly captures the essence of Syndra's power and elegance.

Withered Rose Syndra's abilities are beautifully reimagined to match the theme of the skin. Her Q ability, Dark Sphere, summons a swirling purple rose that explodes upon impact. Her W ability, Force of Will, allows Syndra to manipulate a cluster of roses, lifting and throwing them at her enemies. The E ability, Scatter the Weak, creates a stunning wave of rose petals that stun and damage her foes. Finally, her ultimate ability, Unleashed Power, unleashes a torrent of dark energy in the form of swirling roses, devastating anyone caught in its path.

Aside from the spell effects, Withered Rose Syndra also features new animations and sound effects that further enhance the skin's overall aesthetic. From her graceful movements to the haunting sound of roses blooming, every detail has been carefully crafted to immerse players in the world of Withered Rose Syndra.

Now, let's delve into the story of Syndra and her place in the League of Legends universe. Syndra, the Dark Sovereign, is a powerful mage who wields immense arcane abilities. Born with an extraordinary affinity for magic, Syndra's potential was recognized by the Ionian elders who sought to train her in the ways of the arcane. However, fearing her uncontrollable power, they attempted to suppress her abilities, leading to Syndra's rebellion.

With her newfound freedom, Syndra seeks to unleash her full potential and prove herself as the true master of her own destiny. She is driven by a desire for power and control, seeking to reshape the world according to her own vision. Syndra's story is one of defiance and ambition, as she challenges the established order and seeks to forge her own path.

In the game, Syndra is a mage known for her burst damage and ability to control the battlefield. Her kit revolves around manipulating dark spheres and unleashing devastating spells upon her enemies. With her long-range abilities and crowd control, Syndra excels at punishing opponents who dare to challenge her dominance.

However, Syndra also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making her vulnerable to assassins and champions who can close the gap quickly. Additionally, her abilities require precise positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness, making her a champion that rewards skilled players who can master her mechanics.

With the release of Withered Rose Syndra, players can now experience Syndra's power and elegance in a whole new light. Whether you're a fan of Syndra or simply appreciate the beauty of the skin, Withered Rose Syndra offers a visually stunning and immersive experience that is sure to captivate players.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos showcasing Syndra's various appearances, including the mesmerizing Withered Rose Syndra skin. Explore Syndra's story, strengths, and weaknesses, and witness the full extent of her power as you dive into the world of League of Legends.

Syndra (Star Guardian Syndra)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: September 7, 2017

Star Guardian Syndra is a stunning skin that transforms the powerful and enigmatic Syndra into a celestial guardian of the cosmos. Released on September 7, 2017, this skin is part of the Star Guardian skin line, which features a group of magical girls who protect the universe from evil forces. Syndra's Star Guardian skin brings a whole new level of elegance and mystique to her character, making her a formidable force to be reckoned with.

The Star Guardian Syndra skin is priced at 1350 RP, which is a fair price considering the high-quality visual and sound effects it offers. With this skin, Syndra's abilities are transformed into dazzling cosmic powers, making her a true star among the League of Legends champions.

Star Guardian Syndra: A Cosmic Transformation

Star Guardian Syndra's appearance is a complete departure from her usual dark and sinister aesthetic. She is adorned in a beautiful, flowing white and gold outfit, embellished with intricate celestial patterns. Her hair is styled in a regal updo, adorned with star-shaped hairpins. The skin also features new spell effects, animations, and sound effects that perfectly complement her cosmic theme.

One of the most striking features of the Star Guardian Syndra skin is her new model for her Dark Sphere (Q) ability. Instead of the usual dark orb, Syndra now conjures a vibrant, glowing star that pulsates with cosmic energy. Her Force of Will (W) ability also receives a visual upgrade, with Syndra now manipulating a starry orb to control her enemies. Additionally, her Scatter the Weak (E) ability showcases a stunning cosmic explosion, and her Unleashed Power (R) ability unleashes a torrent of celestial energy upon her foes.

Star Guardian Syndra's recall animation is a true spectacle to behold. She gracefully floats in the air, surrounded by a swirling galaxy of stars, before descending back to the ground with a burst of cosmic energy. This recall animation perfectly captures the essence of her celestial powers and adds an extra touch of grandeur to her character.

Syndra: The Dark Sovereign

Syndra, also known as the Dark Sovereign, is a powerful mage who wields immense control over dark magic. She is a champion with a rich lore and a complex personality. Syndra's story revolves around her struggle to control her immense power and her desire to break free from the constraints placed upon her by the Ionian elders.

Born with an extraordinary affinity for magic, Syndra was taken in by the Ionian elders at a young age to be trained in the ways of magic. However, she quickly grew frustrated with their teachings, feeling that they were holding her back from reaching her true potential. In an act of rebellion, Syndra tapped into forbidden magic and unleashed her powers, causing destruction and chaos. The elders, fearing her uncontrollable power, imprisoned her in a magical prison known as the Temple of the Kinkou Order.

Years later, Syndra managed to break free from her prison and sought revenge against those who had imprisoned her. She unleashed her full power upon the Ionian elders, decimating their stronghold and asserting her dominance. With her newfound freedom, Syndra now seeks to reshape the world in her own image, free from the constraints of others.

In the game, Syndra is a mage with immense burst damage and crowd control abilities. Her Dark Sphere (Q) ability allows her to summon and manipulate dark orbs, dealing damage to her enemies. Her Force of Will (W) ability enables her to grab and throw objects, including enemy minions and monsters, dealing damage and stunning her foes. Syndra's Scatter the Weak (E) ability creates a wave of dark energy that knocks back and damages enemies in its path. Finally, her ultimate ability, Unleashed Power (R), allows her to unleash a barrage of dark spheres upon her enemies, dealing massive damage.

While Syndra possesses incredible power, she also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making her vulnerable to assassins and champions with high mobility. Additionally, her abilities require precise positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness, making her a champion that requires skill and practice to master.

Despite her weaknesses, Syndra has found her place in the League of Legends as a formidable mage who can single-handedly turn the tide of battle. Her ability to burst down enemies and control the battlefield makes her a valuable asset to any team.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Syndra's appearances, including the stunning Star Guardian Syndra skin. Whether you're a fan of her dark and mysterious persona or the celestial beauty of her Star Guardian form, Syndra is a champion that will captivate and challenge you in the world of League of Legends.

Syndra: The Dark Sovereign

Release Date: September 13, 2012

Syndra, the Dark Sovereign, is a powerful mage champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With her mastery over dark magic and manipulation of spheres, Syndra is a formidable force on the battlefield. In this article, we will delve into Syndra's story, her strengths and weaknesses, her background in the game, and her significance in the League of Legends universe.

Background Story

Syndra was born in the Ionian village of Zelos, where she displayed an innate affinity for magic at a young age. However, her powers were seen as dangerous and uncontrollable by the village elders, who feared her potential. Syndra's thirst for knowledge and power led her to seek guidance from a powerful mage named Xerath, who promised to teach her how to control her abilities.

Under Xerath's tutelage, Syndra's powers grew exponentially. However, Xerath had his own agenda and sought to use Syndra as a pawn in his quest for ultimate power. When the village elders discovered Syndra's alliance with Xerath, they attempted to intervene, but it was too late. Syndra unleashed her wrath upon her village, obliterating it and everyone within.

Now consumed by her desire for vengeance and power, Syndra seeks to overthrow those who would try to control her. She believes that true strength lies in embracing the darkness within, and she will stop at nothing to achieve her goals.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Syndra possesses a unique set of strengths and weaknesses that make her a versatile champion in League of Legends. Her primary strength lies in her ability to manipulate dark spheres, which she can use to deal devastating damage to her enemies. Syndra's kit allows her to control the battlefield, zoning out opponents and punishing those who dare to challenge her.

One of Syndra's key strengths is her long-range poke and burst damage. Her Q ability,

allows her to summon a sphere of dark energy and throw it at her enemies, dealing damage upon impact. This ability can be used to harass opponents in the laning phase and set up devastating combos in team fights.

Furthermore, Syndra's W ability,

grants her the power to manipulate her spheres. She can pick up and throw these spheres, stunning enemies in the process. This ability provides Syndra with crowd control and utility, allowing her to control the flow of fights and catch out unsuspecting opponents.

Additionally, Syndra's ultimate ability,

is a game-changer. She gathers all her dark spheres and hurls them at a target, dealing massive damage. This ability can single-handedly eliminate squishy targets or turn the tide of team fights in Syndra's favor.

However, Syndra does have her weaknesses. One of her main vulnerabilities is her lack of mobility. Syndra has no dashes or blinks in her kit, making her susceptible to champions with high mobility who can easily dodge her skill shots and close the gap. Assassins like Zed or champions with strong engage tools can pose a significant threat to Syndra if she is caught out of position.

Furthermore, Syndra's reliance on her spheres for damage makes her somewhat predictable. Skilled opponents can anticipate her abilities and dodge accordingly, reducing her effectiveness in fights. Additionally, Syndra's early game can be challenging, as she requires time to scale and reach her full potential.

Syndra in the Game

Syndra has been a staple pick in the mid lane for many years due to her high burst damage and ability to control team fights. Her long-range poke and zoning potential make her a nightmare for squishy carries, as she can easily burst them down before they have a chance to react.

In the laning phase, Syndra excels at harassing her opponents with her Q ability, forcing them to play defensively and lose out on valuable farm. Her W ability also provides her with a tool to set up ganks or disengage from unfavorable trades.

As the game progresses, Syndra becomes a potent threat in team fights. Her ability to stun multiple enemies with her W and unleash devastating damage with her ultimate can turn the tide of battles. Skilled Syndra players can manipulate their spheres to control the battlefield, zoning out opponents and creating opportunities for their team to secure objectives or pick off enemies.

However, Syndra's effectiveness in the game heavily relies on the player's ability to position themselves correctly and land skill shots. As mentioned earlier, her lack of mobility makes her vulnerable to assassins and champions with high mobility. Therefore, it is crucial for Syndra players to have good map awareness and positioning to avoid being caught out.

Overall, Syndra is a high-risk, high-reward champion who rewards skilled players with her immense burst damage and control. Her dark and vengeful personality adds depth to her character, making her a compelling champion in the League of Legends universe.

Explore Syndra's Skins

On our website, you can access information and videos showcasing all of Syndra's skins. From the classic
to the elegant

each skin offers a unique visual and thematic experience. Discover the different looks and animations of Syndra as you browse through our comprehensive collection of skins.

Whether you are a fan of Syndra's lore, interested in mastering her gameplay, or simply want to admire her stunning skins, our website provides a one-stop destination for all things Syndra.

Syndra (Atlantean Syndra)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: August 13, 2013

The Atlantean Syndra skin is a visually stunning and thematically fitting addition to Syndra's repertoire. Released on August 13, 2013, this skin offers players a unique and captivating look for the Dark Sovereign. With its aquatic-inspired design and mesmerizing effects, Atlantean Syndra is a must-have for any Syndra enthusiast.

The Atlantean Syndra skin transforms the powerful mage into a majestic being from the depths of the ocean. Syndra's usual dark and mysterious appearance is replaced with a vibrant and ethereal aquatic theme. Her hair flows like seaweed, and her dress resembles the waves of the ocean. The skin features intricate details, such as seashells and coral, which add to the overall beauty and elegance of the design.

In addition to the stunning visual changes, Atlantean Syndra also brings new spell effects and animations. Her abilities now showcase aquatic elements, with water particles and bubbles accompanying her every move. The spheres she manipulates with her Dark Sphere (Q) ability are transformed into swirling orbs of water, and her Force of Will (W) ability now features a watery explosion upon impact. The ultimate ability, Unleashed Power (R), unleashes a torrent of water upon her enemies, making it even more satisfying to obliterate foes with her immense power.

Now, let's delve into the lore and story of Syndra herself. Syndra, the Dark Sovereign, is a powerful mage who wields the raw energy of magic. Born with immense potential, she was discovered by the Ionian mage, Master Xander, who took her under his wing to teach her how to control her powers. However, Syndra's thirst for power and independence led her down a different path. She rejected the teachings of Master Xander and sought to harness her abilities without restraint.

In the game, Syndra is a burst mage who excels at dealing massive amounts of damage from a distance. Her abilities revolve around manipulating dark spheres and unleashing them upon her enemies. With her Dark Sphere (Q), she can throw orbs that explode upon contact, damaging and stunning her foes. Her Force of Will (W) ability allows her to grab and manipulate objects, including enemy minions and jungle monsters, dealing damage and slowing them down. Syndra's Scatter the Weak (E) ability is a powerful crowd control tool, as she can knock back and stun enemies in a cone-shaped area. Finally, her ultimate ability, Unleashed Power (R), allows her to unleash a barrage of dark spheres, dealing massive damage to a single target.

Syndra's strengths lie in her ability to burst down enemies quickly and from a safe distance. Her long-range abilities allow her to poke and harass opponents, making it difficult for them to engage. Additionally, her crowd control abilities provide her with some utility and self-peel, allowing her to escape dangerous situations. Syndra's ultimate ability is particularly devastating, as it can instantly delete squishy targets or severely damage tanks.

However, Syndra also has her weaknesses. She is relatively immobile and lacks any form of escape ability, making her vulnerable to assassins and champions with high mobility. Additionally, her abilities require precise positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness. Missing her skill shots can significantly reduce her damage output and leave her vulnerable. Syndra is also mana-reliant, and her abilities can quickly deplete her resources if not managed properly.

In the world of League of Legends, Syndra's story is one of power and ambition. She is a complex character who seeks to break free from the constraints placed upon her and forge her own path. The Atlantean Syndra skin adds another layer to her story, showcasing her connection to the depths of the ocean and the untamed power that lies within her.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Syndra's appearances, including the Atlantean Syndra skin. Whether you're a fan of her base look or want to explore the different thematic variations, Syndra offers a unique and captivating experience for players who enjoy the mage playstyle. Embrace the power of the Dark Sovereign and unleash your potential with Syndra and her Atlantean skin!

Syndra (Pool Party Syndra)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: July 25, 2013

Pool Party Syndra is a delightful skin that brings a splash of summer fun to the powerful mage, Syndra. Released on July 25, 2013, this skin is part of the Pool Party skin line, which features various champions enjoying a day at the beach. With its vibrant colors and playful theme, Pool Party Syndra is a must-have for any Syndra enthusiast looking to add a touch of summer to their gameplay.

The Pool Party Syndra skin transforms the Dark Sovereign into a beach-loving diva. Syndra trades her usual dark and mysterious attire for a vibrant and stylish swimsuit. Her dark hair is now tied up in a ponytail with a cute pink bow, and she wears a pair of fashionable sunglasses to shield her eyes from the sun. Syndra's usual orbs of dark energy are replaced with colorful beach balls, adding a playful twist to her abilities. Her recall animation showcases Syndra lounging on a beach towel, sipping a refreshing drink, and enjoying the summer vibes.

As a champion, Syndra is known for her immense power and control over dark spheres. She is a mage who excels at burst damage and area control, making her a formidable force on the battlefield. Syndra's abilities revolve around manipulating her orbs to deal damage and control the flow of the game. Her strengths lie in her ability to burst down enemies with her ultimate ability, Unleashed Power, which allows her to throw multiple orbs at her foes, dealing massive damage. Additionally, Syndra's Dark Sphere ability provides her with long-range poke and zoning potential, making her a threat in team fights and sieges.

However, Syndra does have her weaknesses. She is a squishy mage with low mobility, making her vulnerable to assassins and champions with high mobility. Syndra relies heavily on landing skillshots and positioning her orbs correctly to maximize her damage output, so players must have good accuracy and game sense to excel with her. Additionally, Syndra's abilities have relatively high mana costs, requiring players to manage their resources carefully to avoid running out of mana during crucial moments.

In the lore of League of Legends, Syndra is a powerful mage from Ionia who possesses an incredible affinity for magic. She was born with immense potential but was feared and shunned by her village due to her uncontrollable powers. Syndra's story is one of isolation and resentment, as she seeks to harness her powers and prove her worth to those who doubted her. In the game, Syndra is often portrayed as a misunderstood and powerful mage, seeking to assert her dominance and prove her superiority over others.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Syndra, including her base skin and other alternate skins. Whether you prefer the dark and mysterious Syndra or the playful and vibrant Pool Party Syndra, there is a skin for every taste. Explore the different looks and abilities of Syndra and discover the one that resonates with you the most.

Syndra (Spirit Blossom Syndra)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: July 22, 2020

The Spirit Blossom Syndra skin is a stunning addition to the League of Legends universe, offering players a visually captivating and thematically fitting costume for the powerful mage. Released on July 22, 2020, this skin is priced at 1350 RP, providing players with a unique and immersive experience when playing as Syndra.

The Spirit Blossom Syndra skin transforms the Dark Sovereign into a graceful and ethereal being, embodying the essence of the Spirit Blossom theme. Syndra's abilities are beautifully reimagined, with vibrant colors and delicate animations that enhance the overall experience of playing as this champion.

In this skin, Syndra dons an elegant white and gold kimono adorned with cherry blossom motifs, symbolizing purity and rebirth. Her hair is styled in an intricate updo, adorned with delicate flowers and ornaments. The skin also features new spell effects, particles, and sound effects, all designed to immerse players in the Spirit Blossom theme.

Syndra's abilities receive a complete makeover in the Spirit Blossom skin. Her Q ability, Dark Sphere, now summons a glowing pink orb, surrounded by cherry blossom petals. When activated, the orb explodes in a burst of petals, adding a touch of beauty to Syndra's devastating power. Her W ability, Force of Will, allows Syndra to manipulate objects with her telekinetic powers. In the Spirit Blossom skin, these objects are transformed into delicate cherry blossom branches, adding a graceful touch to her abilities.

Syndra's E ability, Scatter the Weak, creates a stunning wave of cherry blossom petals that knock back and stun her enemies. The visual effects are mesmerizing, with petals swirling around Syndra as she unleashes her power. Finally, Syndra's ultimate ability, Unleashed Power, is transformed into a torrent of cherry blossom petals that rain down upon her enemies, dealing massive damage and leaving a trail of beauty in their wake.

Now, let's delve into the story of Syndra and her place in the League of Legends universe. Syndra is a powerful mage who hails from Ionia, a land known for its deep connection to magic and spirituality. She possesses an innate ability to manipulate and control dark energy, making her a formidable force on the battlefield.

Syndra's past is shrouded in mystery and tragedy. As a child, she was discovered by the Ionian elders, who recognized her immense potential. However, fearing her uncontrollable power, they sought to suppress and control her abilities. Syndra rebelled against their oppressive ways, unleashing her full power and destroying her captors. This act of defiance led to her exile from Ionia, leaving her bitter and resentful.

In the League of Legends game, Syndra is classified as a mage and excels at dealing burst damage from a distance. Her abilities allow her to manipulate dark energy, hurling orbs and unleashing devastating spells upon her enemies. Syndra's strengths lie in her ability to burst down squishy targets and control team fights with her crowd control abilities. However, she is relatively immobile and vulnerable to crowd control herself, making positioning and timing crucial for success.

Syndra's place in the game is that of a high-risk, high-reward champion. Skilled Syndra players can dominate the mid-lane and carry their team to victory. Her ability to burst down enemies and control the battlefield makes her a valuable asset in team fights. However, Syndra requires precise positioning and timing to maximize her damage output and avoid being caught out of position.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Syndra's appearances in the League of Legends game. From her classic skin to the Spirit Blossom Syndra skin, you can explore the various visual and thematic interpretations of this powerful mage. Whether you prefer the dark and mysterious Syndra or the graceful and enchanting Spirit Blossom Syndra, there is a skin to suit every player's taste.

Syndra (Queen of Diamonds Syndra)

RP: 1350 | Release Date: November 29, 2018

Queen of Diamonds Syndra is a stunning skin that adds a touch of elegance and regality to the powerful mage, Syndra. Released on November 29, 2018, this skin showcases Syndra as the queen of a royal court, adorned in a beautiful diamond-themed outfit that perfectly complements her dark and mysterious nature.

The Queen of Diamonds Syndra skin features a complete visual overhaul, transforming Syndra's appearance into that of a majestic queen. Her usual dark attire is replaced with a regal gown, adorned with intricate diamond patterns and elegant gold accents. Her hair is styled in an elaborate updo, adorned with a crown that signifies her status as the queen. The skin also introduces new visual effects, including sparkling diamonds that surround Syndra's abilities, adding a touch of glamour to her devastating powers.

As Syndra's abilities are unleashed, players will witness the mesmerizing display of power and elegance. Her Q ability, Dark Sphere, summons a diamond-shaped orb that shimmers with an ethereal glow. When unleashed, it explodes into a dazzling display of diamonds, leaving enemies in awe of her power. Her W ability, Force of Will, allows Syndra to manipulate objects with her telekinetic powers. With the Queen of Diamonds Syndra skin, these objects are transformed into shimmering diamonds, further emphasizing her royal presence.

One of the most visually striking aspects of the Queen of Diamonds Syndra skin is her ultimate ability, Unleashed Power. As Syndra channels her immense power, a flurry of diamonds swirls around her, creating a breathtaking spectacle. When the ability is unleashed, the diamonds explode in a dazzling display, leaving enemies in awe of her majestic might.

Now, let's delve into the story of Syndra and her place in the League of Legends universe. Syndra is a powerful mage who hails from Ionia, a land known for its connection to magic and spirituality. However, Syndra's journey has been one of isolation and struggle. From a young age, she possessed an incredible affinity for magic, but her powers were seen as dangerous and uncontrollable by the Ionian elders.

Feeling oppressed and misunderstood, Syndra sought to embrace her powers fully, rejecting the teachings of the Ionian elders. She delved deep into her own magical abilities, unlocking immense power that surpassed anything seen before. With her newfound strength, Syndra sought to reshape the world in her own image, free from the constraints of the Ionian society.

In the game, Syndra is known for her immense burst damage and ability to control the battlefield. Her Q ability, Dark Sphere, allows her to summon orbs of dark energy that can be manipulated and unleashed upon her enemies. Her W ability, Force of Will, grants her the power to manipulate objects and throw them at her foes. Syndra's E ability, Scatter the Weak, unleashes a wave of force that knocks back and stuns enemies in its path. Finally, her ultimate ability, Unleashed Power, allows her to unleash a devastating barrage of dark spheres, dealing massive damage to anyone caught in its path.

While Syndra possesses incredible power, she also has her weaknesses. She is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making her vulnerable to assassins and champions who can close the gap quickly. Additionally, her abilities require precise positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness, making her a champion that rewards skilled players.

Syndra's story and abilities make her a formidable force in the League of Legends universe. Her desire for power and her refusal to conform to societal norms make her a complex and intriguing character. With the Queen of Diamonds Syndra skin, players can embody the regal and powerful side of Syndra, showcasing her as the queen she truly is.

Syndra (SKT T1 Syndra)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: April 30, 2015

Syndra, the Dark Sovereign, is a powerful mage in the popular online game League of Legends. With her ability to manipulate and control dark spheres, Syndra is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. One of her most iconic skins is the SKT T1 Syndra, which pays homage to the legendary Korean esports team SK Telecom T1.

The SKT T1 Syndra skin was released on April 30, 2015, as part of the SKT T1 World Championship skins collection. This collection celebrates the victories of the SK Telecom T1 team in the League of Legends World Championships. The skin is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP.

Details of the SKT T1 Syndra Skin

The SKT T1 Syndra skin transforms Syndra into a member of the SK Telecom T1 team, complete with their iconic black and red color scheme. The skin features new visual effects, animations, and sound effects that give Syndra a unique and stylish look.

One of the standout features of the SKT T1 Syndra skin is the new model for Syndra's dark spheres. Instead of the usual purple spheres, the skin replaces them with black and red spheres that match the SK Telecom T1 team colors. This small change adds a touch of team spirit to Syndra's abilities and makes her stand out on the battlefield.

In addition to the new dark spheres, the SKT T1 Syndra skin also includes new animations for Syndra's abilities. When casting her Q ability, Dark Sphere, Syndra now throws a black and red sphere instead of the usual purple one. Her W ability, Force of Will, also features new animations that match the skin's theme.

The skin also includes new sound effects that further enhance the SKT T1 Syndra experience. From the sound of the spheres being thrown to the impact of her abilities, every sound has been carefully designed to fit the skin's theme. These small details add to the overall immersion and make playing Syndra with the SKT T1 skin a truly unique experience.

Syndra's Story and Gameplay

Syndra's story in the League of Legends universe is one of power and ambition. Born with immense magical potential, Syndra was taken to the Institute of War to be trained as a mage. However, she quickly grew frustrated with the limitations placed upon her by her mentors and sought to unleash her full potential.

In her quest for power, Syndra discovered a forbidden technique that allowed her to harness the energy of the dark spheres. With this newfound power, she became the Dark Sovereign, seeking to overthrow those who had held her back and claim her rightful place as the most powerful mage in the world.

In terms of gameplay, Syndra is a burst mage who excels at dealing massive amounts of damage in a short amount of time. Her abilities revolve around manipulating and throwing dark spheres, allowing her to control the battlefield and eliminate her enemies. Syndra's ultimate ability, Unleashed Power, is particularly devastating, as it allows her to unleash a barrage of dark spheres at her enemies, dealing massive damage.

However, Syndra's power comes at a cost. Her abilities require precise positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness, making her a high skill cap champion. Additionally, Syndra is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making her vulnerable to assassins and champions with high mobility.

Despite her weaknesses, Syndra has found her place in the League of Legends meta as a strong pick in the mid lane. Her ability to burst down squishy targets and control team fights makes her a valuable asset to any team. With the SKT T1 Syndra skin, players can now showcase their love for both Syndra and the SK Telecom T1 team while dominating the Rift.
